sqlMap.sql: sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID, sd.DEFAULT_LABEL as SEC_DEF_DEFAULT_LABEL, sd.LAYOUT_TYPE as SEC_DEF_LAYOUT_TYPE, sd.PAGE_TYPE as SEC_DEF_PAGE_TYPE, sd.ROLE as SEC_DEF_ROLE, sd.SECTION_NAME as SEC_DEF_SECTION_NAME, sd.SECTION_ORDER as SEC_DEF_SECTION_ORDER, sd.SITE_NAME as SEC_DEF_SITE_NAME
sqlMap.select: select distinct ROLE from SECTION_DEFINITION sd
select distinct PAGE_TYPE from SECTION_DEFINITION where (DEFAULT_LABEL is not null and DEFAULT_LABEL <> '') order by PAGE_TYPE

select
from SECTION_DEFINITION sd where sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = #id# and (sd.SITE_NAME is NULL or sd.SITE_NAME = #siteName#)

select
from SECTION_DEFINITION sd
where sd.PAGE_TYPE = #pageType# and (sd.SITE_NAME is NULL or sd.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) and (sd.ROLE is NULL
or locate( #roles[]# , concat(',' , sd.ROLE , ',' ) ) > 0
) order by sd.ROLE, sd.SITE_NAME desc

select
from SECTION_DEFINITION sd where sd.PAGE_TYPE = #pageType# and (sd.SITE_NAME is NULL or sd.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) order by sd.ROLE, sd.SITE_NAME desc
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SECTION_DEFINITION (DEFAULT_LABEL, LAYOUT_TYPE, PAGE_TYPE, ROLE, SECTION_NAME, SECTION_ORDER, SITE_NAME) values (#defaultLabel#, #layoutType#, #pageType#, #role#, #sectionName#, #sectionOrder#, #site.name#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update SECTION_DEFINITION set DEFAULT_LABEL = #defaultLabel#, LAYOUT_TYPE = #layoutType#, PAGE_TYPE = #pageType#, ROLE = #role#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, SECTION_ORDER = #sectionOrder#, SITE_NAME = #site.name# where SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = #id#
